product_details.name: Logitech M590 Silent Wireless Multi-Device Mouse - Ultimate Productivity in Silence
product_details.description:
• Ultra-quiet clicking for distraction-free work environment
• Multi-device connectivity with up to 3 devices (numbered buttons 1-2-3)
• Advanced optical tracking for precise cursor control
• Ergonomic right-handed design for all-day comfort
• Long battery life with smart power management
• Compact and portable design perfect for office or travel
• Easy-switch technology for seamless device switching
• Logitech Flow enabled for cross-computer control
• Durable construction with premium finish
• Wireless freedom with reliable 2.4GHz connection

banner_details:
This banner features a modern and professional product advertisement for a tech accessory, specifically a computer mouse. The composition is centered, with the product image (“product_image”) prominently displayed against a deep radial background, drawing the viewer’s eye. The uppercase headline text (“heading”) uses a futuristic, bold font in white, emphasizing silence and precision. Just below it, the subheadline (“subheading”) in vibrant orange reinforces productivity benefits. A circular badge on the right side highlights a promotional offer (“tagline”) and price (“price”). The slogan (“description”) at the bottom outlines key features in a segmented layout. A bright call-to-action button (“cta”) invites users to take immediate action. The background utilizes geometric gradients, dotted patterns, and connector lines for a tech-savvy feel.

**Color Palette:**
- Deep Blue: #1E3A8A
- Navy: #0F172A
- Gradient Blue Accent: #334F97
- Accent Orange: #FF6B00
- Light Orange: #FF8A3D
- White: #FFFFFF
product_color: The product image features a sleek, modern Logitech mouse with a minimalist dark theme. The primary color is a rich matte black (#1C1C1C), dominating the body of the mouse, offering a professional look. A softer charcoal gray (#2E2E2E) is used to create subtle panel distinctions and ergonomic shaping, seamlessly blending into the design. The mouse wheel uses a combination of metallic silver (#9A9A9A) and dark gray (#3F3F3F) for added contrast and texture. White (#FFFFFF) is used for the brand logo and number keys, providing striking contrast against the dark surface. This monochrome palette enhances sophistication and readability while preserving aesthetic harmony.
